attributes.action: Ban the creation of Online Petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As this site already informs, at present there are over 7000 online petitions already, none of which is given a second glance by the Prime minister or in fact any minister.
I propose that Online Petitions be banned as they are a waste of time and just another way for the government to spy on us.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
